description_text: i didnt recieve my base plate ? order  SSN3980

conversations.body_text: Hi Anze Novak,    We sincerely apologize that the base plates in our German warehouse are currently sold out. We will reship your order after restocking this week.

today i only received pedals only no plate. so i dont need to worry about
it you will ship them next week.
thank you i appreciate your fast response.

Best regards
